UVA Problems

Subsequence


	
//Still a time limit
#include <iostream>
#include <limits>



using namespace std;



int getSum(int sequence[], int s, int n){
	int min = numeric_limits::max();
	for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){
		int sum = 0; 
		for(int j = i; j < n; j++){
			sum += sequence[j];
			// cout << "At i = " << i << " and j = "  << j << " sum is " << sum << endl;
			if(sum >= s && (j - i) + 1 <= min){
				min = (j - i) + 1;
			}
		}
	}



return min;




}



int main(){
	int n, s, num;



while(cin >> n >> s){
	
	int sequence[n];
	for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){
		cin >> num;
		sequence[i] = num;
	}


	int sum = getSum(sequence, s, n);

	if(sum == numeric_limits<int>::max()){
		cout << 0 << endl;
	} else {
		cout << sum << endl;
	}


	






}


return 0;




}
